items.sentence: I had pizza for lunch, so I'd like to have something other than pizza for dinner.
Is it possible for you to come to the office an hour earlier than usual tomorrow?
I'm going to meet Tom's sisters this afternoon. I hope they're both good-looking.
Even though I studied English for 6 years in school, I'm not good at speaking it.
Last month, Tom went to Australia. The month before that, he went to New Zealand.
